sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiMapPin, FiHome, FiLayers, FiDroplet, FiUsers, FiCalendar, FiStar, FiCoffee, FiChevronRight, FiCheck } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { FaSnowflake, FaSkiing, FaHotTub, FaFire, FaMountain, FaLeaf } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ChaletDetailContent = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('about'); // Sample chalet data const chalet = { title: "Luxury Alpine Retreat", city: "Zermatt", canton: "Valais", rating: "4.2", reviews: "5", price: "CHF 2,300,000", pricePerNight: "from â‚¬115/night", status: "Available", beds: 4, baths: 3, sqft: 2800, availability: "Year-round", description: "Stunning luxury chalet with panoramic mountain views, featuring a spacious open-plan living area, state-of-the-art kitchen, and private wellness area with sauna and hot tub. Perfect for both winter ski holidays and summer mountain escapes.", features: [ { name: "Sauna", iconComponent: } ], amenities: [ "Fireplace", "Ski Room", "Hot Tub", "Mountain View", "Terrace", "Heated Floors", "Smart Home" ], locationDescription: "Located in the exclusive area of Zermatt, Valais. The chalet is just 460m from the ski lifts. Surrounded by breathtaking alpine scenery while being just a short walk from the village center with its restaurants and shops.", latitude: 46.02070000, longitude: 7.74910000 }; // Icons for amenities const amenityIcons = { "Fireplace": , "Ski Room": , "Hot Tub": , "Mountain View": , "Terrace": , "Heated Floors": , "Smart Home": }; return (
{/* Luxury Header with Parallax Effect */}
Premium Property

{chalet.title}

{chalet.city}, {chalet.canton}
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}
({chalet.reviews} reviews)
{/* Price and Status with Glass Effect */}
{chalet.price} {chalet.pricePerNight && ( {chalet.pricePerNight} )}
{chalet.status}
{/* Quick Facts with Elegant Cards */}
Bedrooms {chalet.beds}
Bathrooms {chalet.baths}
Area {chalet.sqft.toLocaleString()} sqft
Capacity Sleeps {chalet.beds * 2}
Availability {chalet.availability}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'about' && (

{chalet.description}

Experience Alpine Luxury

This exceptional property offers the perfect blend of traditional Alpine charm with modern luxury. Enjoy breathtaking views in every season from your private sanctuary in the Swiss Alps.

)} {activeTab === 'features' && (
{/* Features Section */}

Chalet Features

{[...chalet.features, {name: "Hot Tub", iconComponent: }, {name: "Ski Access", iconComponent: }, {name: "Fireplace", iconComponent: } ].map((feature, index) => (
{feature.iconComponent} {feature.name}
))}
{/* Amenities Section */}

Premium Amenities

{chalet.amenities.map((amenity, index) => (
{amenityIcons[amenity] || } {amenity}
))}
)} {activeTab === 'location' && (

{chalet.locationDescription}

Location Highlights

  • 460m from ski lifts
  • Walking distance to village
  • Panoramic mountain views
  • Exclusive neighborhood

Map displaying location at coordinates:

{chalet.latitude}, {chalet.longitude}

)}
{/* Call to Action */}

Experience Alpine Luxury

Book your stay or inquire about purchasing this exclusive property

); }; export default ChaletDetailContent;
